alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cook; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cook, Lowndes and eastern Brooks Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 632 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Valdosta, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Hahira, Moody Air Force Base, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Cecil, Barretts, Twin Lakes, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, I-75 At Exit 29, Clyattville, Blue Springs, I-75 At Exit 22 and I-75 At Exit 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
